name: Little Things (Demo)
description:
Navigate through a mundane life. Whether you do or don't, that's up to you. Just hang in there and get through the week. No penalties, whatsoever.

This demo was developed by Team SHEEESH for a workshop cum game jam, Games Bagus 2022!  Designed with mental health in mind, the demo was created to tell a story of how being medicated and on the road to recovery does not make mental illnesses magically disappear. However, you (the player) still deserve a place to call home in the journey to recovery even if it's not as picture-perfect.

ProgrammerFarizahArtistsAbby; AllyLive2D RiggerAbbyScriptwriterCessieTesterRebecca
